name: Nauticrawl
summary: A stolen, enigmatic machine is your only way out. It's likely to kill you, but so will the hostile planet you're escaping. Pull levers, hack devices, and puzzle out how to pilot the Nauticrawl to freedom in this unusual atmospheric adventure... or die trying.
info:
• 别名: NAUTICRAWL: 20,000 ATMOSPHERES

  • 开发: Andrea Interguglielmi
